title: From 1974 to 2025: The story of McLaren's 10 F1 constructors' titles
summary: McLaren secured its 10th constructors' championship in Singapore, adding a new chapter to a legacy built on landmark seasons from 1974 to today

qa_pairs.question: In what year did McLaren secure its first constructors' championship?
How many constructors' championships has McLaren won as of 2025?
Which Grand Prix venue did McLaren secure its 10th constructors' title?
